title: Meta Ads Specialist Manager
job_overview:
UnityHomeOffers (Meta Ads Specialist Manager)

Join Unity Home Offers as Our Meta Ads Specialist Manager!
Are you a seasoned Meta Ads specialist with a knack for driving results and a passion for fast-paced, high-growth environments? Do you thrive in a collaborative culture where your contributions are valued and you're empowered to make a real impact? If so, Unity Home Offers wants you!

We're a dynamic and rapidly expanding real estate team based in sunny California, and we're on the hunt for a talented Meta Ads Specialist Manager to join our vibrant crew. While our core operations and the majority of our team are virtually doing business within California, this role offers the flexibility of remote work. This isn't just another job; it's an opportunity to take the reins of our Meta (Facebook and Instagram) advertising efforts, shape our digital footprint, and directly contribute to our continued success, while gaining invaluable experience working with a leading real estate team in California.

What You'll Do:
As our Meta Ads Specialist Manager, you'll be at the forefront of our digital marketing initiatives. Your primary focus will be on:

Strategizing and Executing Campaigns: You'll be responsible for developing, implementing, and managing highly effective Meta advertising campaigns from conception to optimization. This includes everything from audience targeting and ad creative development to budget allocation and bid management.

Performance Analysis and Optimization: You'll dive deep into data, meticulously analyzing campaign performance, identifying trends, and continuously optimizing strategies to maximize ROI and achieve our ambitious lead generation goals. We're looking for someone who can not only read the numbers but also tell the story behind them.

A/B Testing and Innovation: We believe in continuous improvement. You'll be crucial in designing and executing A/B tests to refine our ad creatives, landing pages, and overall campaign approaches. We encourage innovative thinking and fresh ideas to keep us ahead of the curve.

Collaboration and Reporting: You'll work closely with our sales and marketing teams, providing regular updates on campaign performance, sharing insights, and collaborating on new strategies. Clear communication and a collaborative spirit are key!

Staying Ahead of the Curve: The digital advertising landscape is constantly evolving. We expect you to stay up-to-date with the latest Meta Ads features, best practices, and industry trends, bringing new ideas and strategies to the table.

What We're Looking For:
Proven Meta Ads Expertise: You're not just familiar with Meta Ads; you're a true expert. You have a demonstrated track record of successfully managing and scaling Meta advertising campaigns, delivering measurable results (lead generation, conversions, ROI).

Analytical Mindset: You're comfortable with data and possess strong analytical skills. You can interpret complex information, identify key insights, and translate them into actionable strategies.

Results-Oriented: You're driven by achieving targets and have a strong desire to see your efforts directly impact the business's bottom line.

Fast-Paced Adaptability: Our team moves quickly, and we're constantly evolving. You're comfortable in a dynamic environment, can pivot strategies when needed, and embrace new challenges with enthusiasm.

Excellent Communication: You can clearly articulate your ideas, present data-driven insights, and collaborate effectively with a diverse team.

Team Player with Great Culture Fit: We pride ourselves on our supportive and positive team culture. We're looking for someone who shares our values of collaboration, accountability, and continuous improvement, and who genuinely enjoys working as part of a close-knit team.

Real Estate Interest (Bonus!): While not required, an interest in or understanding of the real estate industry is a definite plus. You'll gain invaluable experience working with a leading real estate team in California!

Why Join Unity Home Offers?
Impactful Role: This is an opportunity to directly influence our growth and be a key player in our success.

Dynamic Environment: You'll be part of a fast-paced, innovative team that's always looking for new ways to excel.

Great Culture: We foster a supportive, collaborative, and fun work environment where everyone's contributions are valued.

Real Estate Experience: Gain valuable, hands-on experience in the exciting California real estate market.

Growth Potential: As we grow, so do the opportunities for our team members.

Remote Work Flexibility: While our business is firmly established in California, this role allows for remote work, enabling you to contribute from anywhere. We're well-versed in virtual collaboration and ensure our remote team members are fully integrated and supported.

If you're ready to bring your Meta Ads expertise to a team that truly appreciates it and wants to help you grow, we encourage you to apply! Show us what you can do to help Unity Home Offers reach new heights.

Clarification on "Virtually Doing Business in California" for the Team and Role:

For Unity Home Offers as a business, "virtually doing business in California" means:

Legal Presence: The company is formally registered and compliant with all California state business requirements. This includes having a valid California business address (which can be a virtual office address that meets specific criteria, not just a P.O. Box), a registered agent in California, and fulfilling all necessary state and local licensing and tax obligations.

Client Base: Our primary client base and real estate operations are focused within California.

Team Collaboration: While individual team members, like this Meta Ads Specialist Manager, can be remote, the overall team operates cohesively as a California-based entity, utilizing virtual tools and communication to achieve shared goals.


For the Meta Ads Specialist Manager role:

Remote Work: The role is designed to be performed remotely, meaning the individual does not need to physically reside in California.
.

This clarification highlights that while the company has a firm legal and operational base in California, the employee can work remotely, making it clear for potential applicants where they fit into the broader picture.
